extendedInfo.description: A simple 8-bit inspired compass app with a retro and nostalgic feel!mario, 8-bit, NES, SNES, old school, retro, atari, pixel graphics, zelda, compass, direction, 8 bit, navigation, orientation**Donation version also available in the app store**

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Not fun I mean its just a compass nothing fun. But the 8 bit compass makes compasses just a little bit more fun. This is a great app,, does what its supposed to, and I would defenitely recommend it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: This is very cool. It reminds me of a game that I liked as a kid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it\'s meant to
reviews.comment: It\'s a compass. What else are you expecting?
reviews.author: Lauren Buttram

reviews.title: Something about it
reviews.comment: Its literally nothing more than a compass. But theres just something about it that makes u feel like ur on an adventure in the classic NES world
reviews.author: Kyle Giambalvo
